description: Configuration for macroeconomic analysis weights. All weights are adjustable. Higher weight = more influence on final score.

popular_metrics.description: Mainstream economic indicators - well-established, widely-followed metrics

alternative_metrics.description: Alternative indicators - less mainstream but valuable forward-looking signals

confidence_adjustments.description: Confidence score adjustments based on agreement between popular and alternative metrics

notes.adjustment_note: You can adjust any weight to emphasize certain metrics more than others
